summary: In 1458, five years after the fall of Constantinople to the Turk, eighteen cardinals met in Rome to elect a new pope. A 27-year-old Spanish cardinal, Rodrigo Borgia, learns to play a very dangerous game; how to survive his first conclave.
cast: Manu Fullola|Brian Blessed|James Faulkner|Rolf Kanies|Holger Kunkel|Peter Guinness|Nicholas Irons|Brian Downey|Lolo Herrero|Gaetano Carotenuto|Matthias Koeberlin|Nora Tschirner|Joseph Rutten|Andrew Keilty|Stacy Smith|Lee J. Campbell|Richard Donat|Dominic Boeer|Lex Gigeroff|John Dunsworth|John Dartt|Jeremy Webb|Mike Gillis|Luis Fernández de Eribe|John Keogh|Hal Tatlidil
keywords: politics|papal election|female nudity|topless female nudity|sex scene
title: The Conclave
